EmailTemplate.name: 201809_Americas_Email_DU875Upgrade_DR.201809_Americas_Email_DU875Upgrade_2_DR
EmailTemplate.subject: DU-875 Display: A Screen Designed to Connect Security and Comfort, and Limited Time Offer Inside
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.westair.com/]]>
Would you watch this at home? Not anymore! So, why trust this in the air? Tired of looking at flight information on a 25-year old CRT screen? Improve your pilot’s vision with the update of Honeywell’s DU-875* displays.
The DU-875 is more than a screen update. It’s a completely new avionics system. Initially designed to overcome the obsolescence of CRT displays, the DU-875 also offers improved flight management tools, future growth capability and improved reliability. The best part? The DU-875 update doesn’t require additional pilot training or cabin modifications.
Update one or all of your screens today and take advantage of a credit of USD $40,000 for each DU-870 when you purchase a DU-875, plus additional incentives in Honeywell’s Avionic Protection Plan.
Contact Western Aircraft, Honeywell’s Authorized Dealer, for more information.
UPDATE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/WesternAircraft_DU-875.html]]>
* Update available for Falcon 900EX/900C and Embraer Legacy 600/650.
